facebook.title: The Statue of Liberty's Complexion
facebook.summary:
Time may have changed the Statue of Liberty's look, but it has not tarnished the American values she symbolizes. Her silent lips still echo the endearing words of Emma Lazarus:

Give me your tired, your poor, 
Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free,
